mapper.select: SELECT q.quest_idx AS `idx`, q.quest_type AS `type`, q.quest_title AS `title`, q.quest_total AS `total` FROM quest q ORDER BY rand() LIMIT #{limit};

SELECT q.quest_type AS `type`, q.quest_title AS `title`, qm.count AS `count`, q.quest_total AS `total`, qm.status AS `status` FROM quest_manager qm LEFT JOIN quest q ON qm.quest_id = q.quest_idx WHERE qm.user_id = #{user_id};
